function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Widespread use of loc-based techniques for viral detection may create false positives or false negatives in diagnostic results.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen cooperation","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of health care personnel","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of symptoms of anxiety, depression, and trauma related to covid-19","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misunderstanding of cholera transmission and causes attributed to divine theory and miasma.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population density contributing to faster spread of the virus","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy on the balcony may lead to behaviors that increase the risk of disease transmission, such as talking loudly and playing loud music.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-contact interaction activities and virtual information networks undermining physical transportation networks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited protection to facilities or objects without considering dependencies or interdependencies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inhalation transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Algal blooms in urban ponds may pose less of a threat to humans, but still require monitoring and management to prevent any potential risks.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of settlement characteristics on covid-19 diffusion, with a focus on mobility.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rethinking public space design to protect and promote planetary health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Blurring of boundaries between conventional engineering and socio-technical management in the water sector","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk values for wnv infection in specific regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Early detection and mitigation of outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize health in economic, political, food, and built environment sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Undetected infected persons contributing to disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misdiagnosis or delayed treatment in telemedicine due to potential information loss or distortion.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on natural convection currents for effective uv light efficacy, which may not be sufficient in all environments.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Industry demand for strategies to mitigate viral transmission due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporating single-day dummy variables for abrupt changes in covid-19 testing availability","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on voluntary adoption","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases through droplets and aerosolization in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food and grocery delivery leading to higher exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic reduction in theme 1 community impact of loneliness in europe, corresponding with rise in theme 3 mental health effect of loneliness","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions and closure of different sectors, including farms, production plants, logistics facilities, and transportation, is unprecedented worldwide.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Flourishing assessment based on a specific conceptualization of flourishing, potentially excluding other important components such as character and virtue.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the impact of buildings on occupant health","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wwm1: waste management","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of epidemic curve as exponential community spread, risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pathogen transmission via surfaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Manipulation of infectious disease data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of non-contact interaction on urban space","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain safety and effectiveness of sealants for duct surfaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Trend towards culturally and climatically responsive designs may not be sufficient to risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective response to pandemic signs and outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infrastructure inequities enhance host
